missionDescription: Define v1 schema (fields + required/optional + enums for workstream type), then implement a minimal CLI (e.g., `python -m case_studies.add`) that creates a new case folder with a prefilled metadata file and runs schema validation before allowing commit.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): A machine-readable case-study catalog schema (JSON Schema/YAML) enforces standardized fields (verbatim claim text, source/context, provenance anchors) across all cases, directly supporting the intake ...
